You know, thinking about it, all this thread needs is fights, if you want to claim a body, imho, you should do it legit. But otherwise, if all you want is a scrap, then anything goes. As long a both parties are happy beforehand then who cares?

Having said that, I also feel the thread suffers from a lack of clear rule system; things such as when a ship is considered dead, when and how much you can resupply, time warp use, phases of play vs shipclass and ship classification itself all need to be readdressed (the list goes on...). Due to these problems my current fight with Zekes has been less enjoyable (for both of us, I'm sure) that it should have been. I think we need to create a flexible rule system that allows different classes of ships and design philosophies to shine in different situations. We should also develop rules that allow for the limitations that a turn bases system impose. For example, in a real space battle TWR (and delta V eventually) would be the deciding factor in range control but this is not currently a factor at all.
